name: Space Invaders (itch) (MoonTech)
description:
Space Invaders

Welcome to Space Invaders. This is a 2D Shooter game. "The Safety of the Universe is in your hands", don't let us down, destroy all the invaders and make our universe safe again! Beware of final boss!

Controls: Arrows or WASD for moving the spaceship. Space for shooting. ESC for Pause Menu.

Important: For a better experience you might want to run this game on a full-screen mode (See the bottom right corner).

I would appreciate any feedbacks! Enjoy the game!

To download the game and see the source code, please visit my Github account: Space Invaders and follow the instructions in Readme file.
